game.name: Civilization V - Explorerâ€™s Map Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explorers Map Pack Ten fantastic single-player maps make up this Civilization V DLC pack designed by Firaxis Games. Five of the maps are based on real-world locations, chosen for their historical interest and gameplay possibilities. The remaining five are scripted map environments.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explorers Map Pack Ten fantastic single-player maps make up this Civilization V DLC pack designed by Firaxis Games. Five of the maps are based on real-world locations, chosen for their historical interest and gameplay possibilities. The remaining five are scripted map environments.
